answers.answer: Hi Des, I´m sorry about your pain. I have a stabbing (and shooting) nerve pain in arms and legs every now and then. But I was worse two years ago, then I had it nearly all the time. It is very painful and if it would last any longer than the seconds it does, I would be crazy from the pain. It can be because of pinched nerves in the back and also in shoulders and many more places. I sure hope you get better soon.My best,Dagun

question: I have fibermyalgia and back problems pinched nerve and diabetesI'm always having shooting pain in my feet hands arms back and left leg. I have a burning sensation all over like a fever and sometimes I get hot and cold flashes. I'm overweight but iv lost 12 dress sizes and 100 pounds. Anyone else have this pain?
title: has anyone heard of nerve damage do bad it hurts all the time?
